SEARCH

Class Question

java.lang.Object
Question
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Q_Art, Q_Science, Q_Sport
public abstract class Question extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract Class that holds most relevant characteristics of a question (description, options, correct option, points and index)
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Question

      public Question(String description, ArrayList<String> optionList, String correctOption, int points, int number)
      Constructor for Question object
      Parameters:
      description - String for actual text of the question
      optionList - ArrayList of all Options to the question (including the correct one)
      correctOption - String for correct option of question
      points - value of points of this question
      number - position of this question in the game
